titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4112) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1999, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-601, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4112 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. After general debate the bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule and shall be considered as read. No amendment shall be in order except those printed in the report of the Committee on Rules (H.Rept. 105-601). All points of order against the amendments are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 216.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.

vote.text: POSTPONED VOTE - The Speaker put the question on agreeing to the resolution by voice vote and announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Frost objected to the voice vote, and pending that made a point of no quorum. The Speaker postponed further proceedings on the resolution until later in the day. The point of no quorum was considered as withdrawn.

action.text: ORDER OF PROCEDURE - The Speaker announced that requests for electronic votes postponed from earlier today will be taken in the following order: H.Res. 491, H.Res. 485, H.Res. 489 (previous qestion).
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 194 (Roll No. 269).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 188 (Roll No. 270).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/24/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4112 (legislative branch appropriations)
